agent_utterance: Great plan. Here is a light, actionable version you can use today: - Three regular meals and one small snack. - Before each meal, do a 5-minute urge-check-in: drink a glass of water, then do 4-4-4 box breathing (inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4) for 4 rounds, and jot any urges in your tracker. - If cravings spike, pause, do a quick grounding exercise (5-4-3-2-1) and text your support buddy for a check-in. - Log this plan and your responses (urges, actions, mood) after each mealtime. - Hydration and heat tip: stay hydrated and opt for cooling, light options (fruit, yogurt) to support regular meals in warm weather.
